''January 1'') is a [[Portugal|Portuguese]] daily [[newspaper]], published in [[Porto]], where it was founded in 1868. ==See also== *[[List of newspapers in Portugal]] ==External links== [http://www.oprimeirodejaneiro.pt/ ''O Primeiro de Janeiro'' online] {{portugal-newspaper-stub}} {{Portugal newspapers}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Primeiro de Janeiro}} [[Category:Newspapers published in Portugal]] [[Category:Publications established in 1868]] [[Category:Media in Porto]]
